mapper.select: SELECT ss.student_id, ss.student_name, ss.student_num, ss.student_phone, ss.student_email, ss.student_salt, ss.student_sex, ss.classes_id, ss.dormitory_id, ss.bed_id, ss.student_status, cli.classes_name, cli.classes_status, mi.major_id, mi.major_name, ci.college_id, ci.college_name, bed.bed_name, di.dormitory_name, di.building_floor, di.dormitory_status, di.use_status, bi.building_id, bi.building_name, bi.short_name FROM sys_student ss LEFT JOIN classes_info cli ON ss.classes_id = cli.classes_id LEFT JOIN major_info mi ON cli.major_id = mi.major_id LEFT JOIN college_info ci ON mi.college_id = ci.college_id LEFT JOIN bed_info bed ON ss.bed_id = bed.bed_id LEFT JOIN dormitory_info di ON ss.dormitory_id = di.dormitory_id LEFT JOIN building_info bi ON di.building_id = bi.building_id WHERE ss.delete_flag = 0 AND ss.student_id = #{studentId}
